data.question: What is the chemical formula for the first organic-based magnet reported?
What is the ferrimagnetic ordering temperature of [V(TCNE)x]·z CH2Cl2?
True or False: Solvent-free thin films of [V(TCNE)x] exhibit different magnetic behavior compared to their amorphous form.
What method was used to determine the structure of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2?
data.answer: Rietveld refinement of synchrotron powder diffraction data

data.question: True or False: The structures of [M(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2 (M = V, Mn, Fe) are well-known due to the availability of single crystals.
What is the observed Fe-N-C angle in the structure of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2?
What is the significance of the canting of octahedra in the structure of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2?
data.answer: It leads to undulation of the extended {FeII(TCNE)C-} plane, decreasing the deviation of the Fe-N-C angle from the preferred 180 degrees to the observed compromise value of 173 degrees.

data.question: True or False: The [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2 structure contains only one form of reduced TCNE.
What type of spin coupling is dominant in the magnetic ordering of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2?
data.answer: Direct exchange between the S = 2 FeII and the S = 1/2 m4-[TCNE]C- ions

data.question: True or False: Heating paramagnetic [M{C4(CN)8}(NCMe)2]·z CH2Cl2 (M = Mn, Fe) does not affect its magnetic properties.
What is the calculated magnitude of the pairwise spin coupling J in units of K for [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2?
True or False: The structure of room-temperature [V(TCNE)x]-based magnets likely involves VII ions bridged by m4-[TCNE]C- ligands within a layer.
How does the presence of [C4(CN)8]2- affect the number of antiferromagnetically coupled [TCNE]C- species in [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2?
data.answer: It decreases the number of antiferromagnetically coupled [TCNE]C- species.

data.question: True or False: The observed M(H) value at 2 K and 9 T for [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2 is lower than expected for a spin-only S = 2 FeII center antiferromagnetically coupled to two S = 1/2 [TCNE]C- ions.
What is the observed saturation magnetization of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2 at 2 K and 9 T?
True or False: The structure of [FeII(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2 suggests that [V(TCNE)x] is amorphous with a local structural order prone to defects.
What is the role of m4-[C4(CN)8]2- ligands in the structure of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2?
data.answer: They interconnect the {FeII(TCNE)C-} layers and contribute to the canting of the FeN6 octahedra.

data.question: True or False: The IR spectrum of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2 shows nCN absorptions only at 2221 cm-1.
What is the preferred bonding angle of the sp-hybridized NC group to the Fe center in [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2?
How does the observed canting of the octahedra affect the extended {FeII(TCNE)C-} plane in [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2?
data.answer: It causes undulation of the plane, which decreases the deviation of the Fe-N-C angle from the preferred 180 degrees.
